page.title: 19Education in Halewood.
page.content: Pre-school education is not very well catered for in Halewood. There is only one day nursery in our survey area. There are, however, a couple of playgroups run by local organisations. The falling population of Halewood (although it has recently remained stable) has meant that schools have become much smaller. All but two of the local schools have had their infant and junior departments merged. There has also been the closure of one Catholic primary school. Secondary education is limited to one county school and one Catholic school with a total of 1400 pupils. A secondary school has recently closed and there are moves to close the Catholic school. There are no facilities for further education, but the county secondary school runs adult education classes.
